website_summaries.verdict: Projects moving white snowflakes against the side of your house within minutes of opening the box.
pros: Comes with two mounts, a stake for putting it in the yard, and a mounting plate for attachment to a wall, tree, or pole
Remote control allows you to change display modes without having to leave the house
cons: The area covered by the display is on the smaller side compared to some other projectors

customer_reviews.title: Snowflakes Galore
customer_reviews.text: It’s again the start of the festive season, & you want the best decoration product for your outdoor area. This time if you want to decorate your lawn with Light Projectors then this is for you. As this one-time investment, you have to choose projectors on your requirement & product efficiency. The range of the laser really impressed me. It is powerful & offers a broad area coverage, they have also made it a priority to include an equally powerful remote. It is also waterproof. Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmela G

customer_reviews.title: A winter wonderland
customer_reviews.text: This machine turned our Socal house into a winter wonderland. It creates these super clear snow flakes that dances all over your house and walls. It has a really long cord so you can extend it quite a bit from the outlet. It is tiny and you can easily hide it by a plant but produces crystal clear beautiful white images of “winter”. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Very cool snowflake effect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this projector to use on my balcony and I was pleasantly surprised at how nice the snowflake effect is. As you can see in the video and pictures, there are small and large snowflakes that move around and can be adjusted with the little remote. The attached cord is around 22 ft long which is better than my other projector. All in all, very pleased with the effect this delivers.
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Projection of Snowflakes
customer_reviews.text: The projection is clear and beautiful. Looks amazing at night and covers the whole front porch of my house. Excited to put it up this Christmas. I sometimes use it to project snowflakes at the ceiling of my daughter’s room, and she gets so excited every time.
customer_reviews.author: BlackCanvas

customer_reviews.title: Nice, for a small area
customer_reviews.text: Works really good and looks nice, but for $35.00 I would expect it to cover more than a 4’ area. I want to use this for outside but I would need to buy like 4 more to cover my house, disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly e ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more to get a better light.
customer_reviews.text: This is really junk for the price. It’s flimsy. I live in a very dark location with no street lights and it barely covers the front of my living room. It’s no where near as bright as some of my neighbors. I have seen comparable ones in the mainstream stores for about $20. UPDATE: based on my original review above, Aloveco sent me a second unit for free. I was willing to try two at once. It arrived within a week and here’s the best part, the first unit was completely non-functional by then. The week old unit would not turn on. I’ve changed my two star review to a one star review. This stuff is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Dina L. Giovanelli

customer_reviews.title: Stupid Gaget
customer_reviews.text: This is the dumbest thing ever. I thought I was getting a light with a stake. There is a stake but almost impossible to assemble it. There is a bunch of little screws and horrible direction. So my light is propped up in a dead plant. After Christmas I will probably toss it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment about sums it up!
customer_reviews.text: Wish we received what the 5 star users got!!! We are so disappointed! Just ordered one very much like this last week, we were so pleased and excited that we immediately ordered a similar product, as that one was already "out of stock ". This product arrived barely boxed and missing parts. We pieced it together as best we could, plugged it in, and what an absolute let down. Shame on you Amazon for shipping a return without checking for quality. Not only that, but this thing barely lights up a small room much less outside of a house! -10 for quality and service.
customer_reviews.author: Talkaleena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, But Not Good for Outside
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these lights. They have a beautiful snowflake pattern, but they are definitely not good for outside projection. I have tried placing them far away and closer to the house, but you can only see these if you are standing in the yard. They cannot be seen from the road at all. I was so disappointed when I drove past the house and it looked as if there were no lights on.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: Not even close
customer_reviews.text: The snowflakes look nothing like the video does. They are barely visible and blurry. The total area covered isn’t even close to what is advertised. I gave one star for “East to assemble” not because it isn’t easy, but because there are several small pieces that are very easy to lose. Not well thought through.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying.  Cannot see projection
customer_reviews.text: Cannot see projection if placed more than 10 feet away from wall. Only projects in about 5’x5’ . Very light and can barely see projection.
customer_reviews.author: JL13

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Effective range is about 30 feet not the 150 feet listed in description. Beyond 30 all you get is a jumbled blur.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Charter

customer_reviews.title: too dark to be of any use
customer_reviews.text: I can barely see it on the trees in our back yard. Not at all bright enough to be of use. Being returned.
customer_reviews.author: markio

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We received this very quickly which was great but I had to leave 1 star because this literally lights up only my front door. The lights are very dim and a very cool white which leaves it looking purple up against our white lights. This is way too expensive for this and you would need 10 of them to light up the front of your house. I will be returning it unfortunately because it just doesn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Dana C

customer_reviews.title: It's certainly not the best
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to put together and set up and while testing it inside, it seemed pretty good, but as soon as I took it outside I was very disappointed. You need it far away from the house to cover any area, but then it's not bright enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Gestwicki

customer_reviews.title: Rather small and dim projection of snowflakes
customer_reviews.text: The good: the snowflake patterns and movement are excellent. The bad: the light display is small. From 15 feet away, the display was about a 9 foot diameter circle. The ugly: the light output is low. In a rather long dark driveway, the show is hard to see. This would work in a dark bedroom to project snowflakes on the ceiling. For outside, to light up a two car garage that is far away from street lamps. It might work if you use two units that are 12 feet away. Even then, it won't be too impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I am underwhelmed by this. It has good features, such as a remote control and I like the snowflake images, it is just not very bright. Moreover, it does not project very widely. I had a Halloween themed projector and it covered my whole house, this one barely projects much beyond my front door; maybe about eight feet total.
customer_reviews.author: Antony S. Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Ok Light for a Cottage, Unfortunately, I have a House
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the stellar reviews on Amazon. So I bought one and found out it worked ok but it didnt have the range I thought it would, nor the light intensity. I have a 2100 SQ Ft house, at the end of a cul-de-sac, in the country with no street lights. So I bought a second one of these and the second one wasn't even as bright as the first and after the second night the motor stopped working. Unfortunately, I am returning both of these and going with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I had so much hope for this. I couldn't even put it in the yard for 2 reasons. 1, as soon as I put it in the ground the stick broke off in the ground when I tried to adjust it. 2, it wasn't bright enough to shine on the house while it was in the yard. I had to move it to the porch, only to shine on the front door to be able to see it a little bit. This was a big disappointment. If it's not too late I will return it, but it did not serve the purpose it was meant for.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Milford

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it may be a little extra, but that's what it's for that extra effect you want to wow your guest with, It works beautifully, you have to place just right to get the panorama effect you may desire and you can concentrate it in certain spots. Really liked the added atmospheric feeling this unit provided. So did my guest. Does not have an on off switch you will have to unplug to disengage, to me that's not a biggie. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: JUNK DO NOT PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTE JUNK!! WILL BE RETURNING!! Snowflakes are barley even visible because of size. Don’t even cover a very large area at all. JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Marek

customer_reviews.title: Misleading and cheap craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement for this product is deceiving. It says the light itself and the cord is waterproof... Which is technically true, but the plug itself is not. There are warnings all over the device saying that it requires a secure cover and not to expose it to weather. On top of that I cannot figure out how to assemble the stake mechanism to the light fixture itself. The screw they provide is not long enough and I’ve tried every alternative. The only helpline is an email, and I like to talk to a real person when I’m having problems like this. too much hassle and misleading specifications led me to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Nutmeg

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t do the job as it said
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this Christmas snow flake projector for my outdoor decor . But as soon as I opened it, the heavy plastic smell make me feels very uncomfortable. The quality of the projector doesn’t looks new, it has scratch mark appearances. Upon use , the image of the snowflake are blurry, not as it described on the website. So disappointed. Return for something better
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright and broken the 2nd day I had it
customer_reviews.text: The light on this is not very bright. I have to use it with my 2 other snowflake lights to make a dent in it reflecting off my house. The plastic stake also broke the 2nd day we used it. I will have to superglue it fix. If you are looking for something that does a bright job in a large space, I would suggest a better model. If you are looking to do a small place, it might work for that.
customer_reviews.author: L. G. Saya

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to project on my garage. It didn't project well. Not as pictured where is shows a wide ramge of smow flakes. The flakes were faint. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Nice for a small bedroom , but doesn’t cover or show up when used outside, if you put the lights further away as the manufacturer suggests then the snowflakes are blurry and faint , so you have to put closer to get a vivid image and only covers one half of my garage, going to use for inside, I bought it for outdoor use. If they can fix the intensity and cover larger area it’s 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MPS mom

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Muted lighting. Does not project well. Very small. Half the size of other laser lights. Made well, but too small for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: liv4jc

customer_reviews.title: Great for close up...
customer_reviews.text: Cons: The projection isn’t as strong as I had hoped it would be but does the trick. I wanted it to shine over the whole house but we had to put it about 15 feet from the front door to get it to show up. Pros: Super easy to install and the remote is great!
customer_reviews.author: Maura Hill

customer_reviews.title: poor quality/ dim lights
customer_reviews.text: lighting is very dim and shows up in only a small section of the house- maybe 8-10 feet wide. So dim it is hard to see the lights. Shipped quickly and remote feature was nice, but quality is lacking. Also, it turns off prior to the set timer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright & clear.
customer_reviews.text: For the money (nearly $50/tax) is it not worth it to me. Not very bright & clear at all & does not cover very much space without looking too distorted. I wrote the company to let them know... as they asked what we thought about the item. Their website said they would respond back within 12 hours & they did not... I still haven't heard back by the way. So we'll see what they have to say... maybe??? 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one night of use and being in the rain. Lights were pretty dim and small. Remote worked well though. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: If you want to put this 8 feet away from the surface you get a 6x6 foot projection which is dim at best. Any further away it is really dim and un viewable. Not what it’s advertised to be
customer_reviews.author: Christine Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Real snowflakes not dots!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the only light that had real snowflakes. Most others only have white dots. So happy with this light for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: TexasWren

customer_reviews.title: Fairly decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Easy to operate. My only slight complaints are: - Wish they were a bit brighter. With other lights installed,these completely disappear. - Wish the field of projection on them was a hair wider.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. I tried it on the ceiling inside just to check it out. This will be very pretty for Christmas decorations. My kids saw me light up the room with this and they loved it, so I anticipate this will be quite the hit with them when it's time to decorate for Christmas. They're so excited!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee W

customer_reviews.title: does not "project" much
customer_reviews.text: Pretty snow flakes but does not project/cover but about 2-feet wide, not the entire side of a house like the picture and product imply. Sorry I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: SC Girl

customer_reviews.title: As described! Love the projector!
customer_reviews.text: I like how we have options to make the snowflakes go fast or slow. The projector covers a certain diameter. I did a jingle bell rock dance, this covered half of my ceiling. I should’ve ordered 2 projectors. Overall, I am happy that I purchased it! <3
customer_reviews.author: sisavanh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste tour money
customer_reviews.text: Worse projector ever. I bought a cheaper one for $17 at Walmart and it was so much sharper and brighter. Don’t waste tour money
customer_reviews.author: Kwine2000

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is horrible. I would pay a little more next time for better quality. I have a small house and it only lights up one window! I would need five of them to light up the front of my house. And the snow flacks are not that bright. They are a little hard to see too.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Mitcheff

customer_reviews.title: NOT AT ALL WHAT WAS DESCRIBED!
customer_reviews.text: I was excieted when I purchased this item however, extremily disappointed when I received this item it is not at all what it claimed to be, did not work at all a very small circle of lights less than 12in across side to side...
customer_reviews.author: DebrasPrimeAcct

customer_reviews.title: Not very good at all
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t show up at all no matter how I adjusted it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kontos

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work as well as I had hoped. Not very bright on the front of the house. Had to be pretty close. The timer was a problem, turned on at odd times and not at scheduled times. Had to check it each night and reset it frequently. Wish it worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these based on reviews to use outside this year. But, you can hardly see them outside. Instead of returning them I've now got them both in my living room pointed to the ceiling and I love the snowflakes floating around there even though I'm not in that room very much. Probably should have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It does not cover much! Even at only a few feet away you can hardly tell it’s on! I had planned on placing it in the yard facing my house but you can’t see it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power.
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea, but should have gotten some that have more power. If you're going any distance from your house outside, better be close. I managed to find a use, but it took some doing and it's on the side of the house because I couldn't stake them anywhere else sensibly. So if you want big, bright graphics, get the stronger ones. Otherwise they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: MaryBA

customer_reviews.title: Falling snowflake projector
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Loved the way it projects falling snowflakes - more realistic action than most other projectors. Wish the projection was a little brighter. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Let it Snow
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. It does look like it is snowing and not just a revoling snowflake going around and around. Will look to see if this company makes other holiday lights.
customer_reviews.author: MVP

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright at all
customer_reviews.text: In addition to intensity being low this product description is incorrect. Its 4W not 5W
customer_reviews.author: Victorious

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Projection window is small so you’ll need a bunch of these to make the desired effect. Sad because the projection itself is really beautiful. Returning
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is a low voltage lamp
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this, the swirling pattern is what we were looking for but it is barely visible even at close distances. Lamp is low voltage lighting and the coverage is very small and faint. Would love to see this same pattern in a bright AC lamp. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't say a bright light show of snowflake
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy to receive this year but so disappointed. It would have to be pitch black (with none of your other lights on) for it to show up. Sorry I wouldn't spent this amount again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not bright enough, Not waterproof and it Stopped working. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Polar Ice

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to install outside. Connected the included stake and went to stick it in the soft wet ground outside. The stake promptly and easily broke. So much for installing it outside. Don’t waste your money on this light
customer_reviews.author: marvin

customer_reviews.title: Very poor output. Projects to small area
customer_reviews.text: Very poor output. Can barely see it projected to my house. Also projects to small area. Being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Joon Choi

customer_reviews.title: Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item. Was so dull that even in very dark areas the snow was very faint... a big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: BJF

customer_reviews.title: We need a better product
customer_reviews.text: That is not strong enough to cover a standard wall, we need like 4 or 5 to cover a wall.
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as needed
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed. I thought it would be much brighter then it ended up being. Guess I will look into lasers next year.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible brightness.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible brightness. Returning right away. Not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Biggest rip-off ever
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the front of my house. Even when I turn all my outside lights off, I can barely see the projection. I truly can’t believe I spent money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Clay

customer_reviews.title: Does not cover a very big area at all maybe 10 x 10 tops
customer_reviews.text: a bit disappointed for the money that I thought I would see a lot of snowflakes across the front of my house. the further you move from the house the less it looks like snow , just blobs.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: lights
customer_reviews.text: Returned because I did not feel like it was bright enough could not really see it on the house
customer_reviews.author: Diane Y

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother with this one.
customer_reviews.text: This is quite possibly the worst product I have ever purchased on Amazon Prime!
customer_reviews.author: Martib

customer_reviews.title: These lights are not bright unless you are very close to the object you are projecting them on to
customer_reviews.text: These lights were really easy to use, but I didn't like them at all, they were not very bright, as in couldn't be seen from the road and it would have taken toooooo many of them to keep them close enough to the wall to be seen. Not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wycoff

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Totally NOT a gopd light for anything but the smallest, darkest uses.
customer_reviews.author: B Y

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice but not bright enough, really hard to see on the house
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Love these snowflakes
customer_reviews.text: The snowflakes look great against the house. If you have a large home, I would recommend more than 1 since it doesn't cover an enormous space if it is place fairly close to the house. The remote worked great and I would recommend this product. I miss snow fall, so it put a smile on my face to see this.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Xmas decor
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, very attentive! Adjustable snow speed and flashing function thru the remote. Lovely Xmas decor.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: It's projection was to small, and not bright enough to see
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES H. STOEHR

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These snowflakes are tiny it only projects in a tiny area the pictures are deceiving. I most likely will return.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The lights were so dim I had to put it about 3 feet from the wall. Only covered a couple feet wide. I returned it. Amazons return process is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Barker Duerksen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product in yesterday it came fast it was really easy to use and set up. the product and the remote control felt really good quality. Cant wait to have my friends and family over my house so they can see how amazing it looks at night. I really recommend this product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Monterrosa

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Had barely any projection at all. Totally useless, sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Redzig

customer_reviews.title: it's a bad product
customer_reviews.text: I currently have 5 different projector lights I bought last year set up in front of the house. This new projector light is blurry and not bright at all. I removed it and put it back in the box right away. Its the most expensive projector light I have bought and it's not even worth turn it on.
customer_reviews.author: Derek L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the brightness of the product, I attempted to use outside, that was a mistake, it is made for a small room indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This product broke while we were putting it together. We could barely see the lights against our house. Cheaply made. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Light up the night
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but didnt fill the room ..just small section
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bracamontes

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Returning this item. Not large enough to even cover a small portion outside. Also, not nearly bright enough. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: LWagner

customer_reviews.title: Ok but would not repurchase
customer_reviews.text: This item was easy to set up but it’s pretty dim, and not very broad as compared to other projectors. When I moved it further back the image got blurry. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hisshisskitty

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Very small projection area. Unless you project from a great distance and then the quality suffers. If close great deal just for outside or other then one wall not good at all
customer_reviews.author: Kim Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Yes I returned it
customer_reviews.text: Not the brightest by no means, needs to place close to house or garage to see. Don't expect your neighbors to notice it, I could barely see it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: very dim! Nothing compared to the advertisement photos
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement display was nothing like the real thing. The lights were very dim unless they were close to the house which in that case, only covered a small section of the house. It would take about 12 of these in close range to get the look we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose Velotta

customer_reviews.title: Not the brightest.
customer_reviews.text: Brightness was weak. Covered to small of an area on the house. Liked the snowflake figure.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Easy outdoor decorating
customer_reviews.text: Not as bright as I would have liked but, worked nicely
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Woefully underpowered
customer_reviews.text: Amazon ad shows this device projecting snowflakes on the entire front of a house. It simply isn't bright enough to do anything near that. If you have a streetlight anywhere near your house, you won't see a thing. Will be returning for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Ardern

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 and both of them stopped working after first rainfall.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Estep

customer_reviews.title: Only good for indoor
customer_reviews.text: Only good for indoor. When used outdoor it’s way too dim.
customer_reviews.author: aynita

customer_reviews.title: NOT bright and small!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to give this zero stars! Not bright, very small. Can barely see any lights at all. Do NOT buy this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: htfyhsdr5tu5ed8ue5

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed !!
customer_reviews.text: You could see the snowflakes as long as you were about 20 ft from the house. Just look like Faint blobs from the road. I bought four- not worth the money . Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Ritenour

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 30 days.....Would not suggest purchasing this product
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 30 days.....Would not suggest purchasing this product
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Snowflake looks cool!
customer_reviews.text: The projector works good. The snowflakes are so cute. Also the speed of the movement can be adjusted. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Jason-

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought three, but don't get what I expected for (like the demo video).
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Godwin

customer_reviews.title: Projection doesn't work well with other christmas lights.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed after changing several locations for this item and still does not work well..
customer_reviews.author: F. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful detail in the snowflakes. Bought to project onto a big evergreen in yard. Will be getting another for house.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t project on house like advertised
customer_reviews.text: You have to be standing close to the house to see any of the snowflakes. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment for an outdoor light display
customer_reviews.text: Very small ,weak, indistinct pattern when used outdoors. Ineffective and a poor choice to supplement our outdoor light display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Item is not described ..... Definitley does not work in the max projection area as described...requires COMPLETE darkness to be seen when projected to cover a large area... very disappointed in this light ...
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Snowflakes are great
customer_reviews.text: It It made putting lights on the house for Christmas decorations easier
customer_reviews.author: Lovell E. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Display is very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Product does not display on home as advertised. No other light can be on if you want to see snowflakes. Also adjusting arm broke very easily. Can be out on any stand due to broken adjustable arm.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: No remote came with my lights.very small and blurry.very very dissatisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The charge is only about three hours and in a winter climate it is not high enough off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Helmuth

product_meta.title: ALOVECO Christmas Snowflake Projector Lights, Upgrade Rotating LED Snowfall Projection Lamp with Remote Control, Outdoor Waterproof Sparkling Landscape Decorative Lighting for Halloween Xmas Party
feature_bullets: 【2019 UPGRADE Projectors Lights】: Upgraded! ALOVECO LED Christmas Projector Light show the "Snowflake" + "Snowfall" +"Small Snowflake" together with a wide projection range than others! Unlike other snowflake projectors, there are more white rotating snowflakes made to mimic the look of falling snow with big snowflake, even if you live somewhere that doesn't get quite cold enough for snow you can still enjoy the beauty of a White Christmas.

【High Quality LED Chip】: Made of high brightness LED lights, your neighbors will be seeing beautiful clearly defined snowflake snowfall images on your house, garage at night.Watching from a window as dozens of snowflakes descend and coat the streets around you is one of the most magical moments of the season. So why not create the magical moment yourself?

【Remote Operation & Roating】: Include a wireless remote controller that allows you to control the projector's functions from 10M distance, very convenient! You also can change the Roating Modes by the remote: ON/OFF, FLASH+, FLASH-,MOTOR+,MOTOR- .The remote control has a memory function (no need to repeat settings) and "Timer" function: 2Hrs, 4Hrs, 6Hrs.

【Indoor Outdoor Projector Lights】: We' ve seen how great a snowflake projector can look on the outside of your home, but what if you want to continue that theme indoors? Well, you can! Deck the halls or deck your walls with this chic snowflake projector. Waterproof IP65, will survive even the harshest of weather situations. Come with 7M/23ft cord will easily reach most outside home outlets from where you set it up.

【After-sale& Certification】: 18 Month After-sale, if you have any problem with our Christmas Snowflake Snowfall Projector Lights pls don't hesitate to contact us then we will supply you best after-service! Our christmas projector light have CE、FCC、ROHS Certification, and we have European and American appearance patents.
